Uses of Class
org.xchain.framework.scanner.ScanNode

  • Packages that use ScanNode 
    Package Description
    org.xchain.framework.lifecycle
    Provides classes that execute the XChain lifecycle.
    org.xchain.framework.scanner
    This package provides scanning services for the XChains Framework.

      Scans the root urls found by the locator and returns the root scan node for those roots.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the child nodes for this node.
      Methods in org.xchain.framework.scanner with parameters of type ScanNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ZipProtocolScanner.scan(ScanNode rootNode, java.net.URL zipUrl)
      Scans the entries in a Weblogic Zip URL and adds all of the entries of that jar into the tree rooted at rootNode.
      void VfsProtocolScanner.scan(ScanNode rootNode, java.net.URL vfsUrl)
      Scans the VFS URL and adds the nodes in that url to the root node.
      void ProtocolScanner.scan(ScanNode rootNode, java.net.URL rootUrl)
      Scans the entire root URL and adds its entries into the root node specified.
      void JarProtocolScanner.scan(ScanNode rootNode, java.net.URL jarUrl)
      Scans the entire jar at the specified url and adds all of the entries of that jar into the tree rooted at rootNode.
      void FileProtocolScanner.scan(ScanNode rootNode, java.net.URL fileUrl)
      Scans the entire directory at the specified url and adds all of the entries of that jar into the tree rooted at rootNode.
      void BundleProtocolScanner.scan(ScanNode rootNode, java.net.URL bundleUrl)
      Scans the entries in a Weblogic Zip URL and adds all of the entries of that jar into the tree rooted at rootNode.
      void BundleProtocolScanner.scanDirectory(ScanNode scanNode, java.lang.String path, org.osgi.framework.Bundle bundle) 
      void BundleProtocolScanner.scanJar(ScanNode scanNode, java.lang.String path, org.osgi.framework.Bundle bundle) 
      abstract void AbstractScanner.scanNode(ScanNode node) 
      static java.lang.String AbstractScanner.toClassName(ScanNode scanNode)
